flawed_nl_solution:

So 8 years ago John had 12*2=24 years experience
That means John has 24+8=<<24+8=36>>36 years experience
So Mike has 36-16=<<36-16=20>>20 years of experience
So together they have 20+36+20=<<20+36+20=76>>76 years experience

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
